general information:
Marketing Information 22" class LED Monitor with In-Plane Switching Technology for better picture quality, color accuracy and extended viewing angles.
Ultra-narrow bezel monitor with a seemingly borderless appearance. Full HD viewing and 50,000,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio. Black and silver finish with detachable multi-purpose stand (standard or photo frame), and complete VGA and DVI-D ports.
